column6: Pursat Province.------The victims were a 7 year old boy and his 2 year old sister who lived in the property.------Police said that this happened when the mother was out harvesting rice 500 meters away and the father was taking care of buffaloes about 3 km with another son.------ ------https://postnews.com.kh/local/405186
